title: [1.2.5][SSP]【MC幻想乡系列】弹幕就是火力DA☆ZE——爱丽丝的弹幕回忆
author: rainsillwood
txt_content:
本帖最后由 rainsillwood 于 2012-6-4 23:24 编辑 

时间紧急先稍稍介绍下吧= =本人是东方控所以才转载的这个mod
联动：爱丽丝的人偶：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-15754-1-1.html
          东方道具全收集：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-24978-1-1.html
此mod增加了一个物品——爱丽丝的魔法书




book.JPG (4.82 KB, 下载次数: 18)

下载附件

2012-5-31 21:51 上传





合成公式：




1.JPG (11.13 KB, 下载次数: 19)

下载附件

2012-5-31 21:51 上传






这可是一个神器哦首先，它相当于铁镐+铁斧+铁铲三合一工具。其次，它还是一个便携的合成台。此外还能发射出强大的弹幕，同时也是一个强大的近战武器！

使用方法：
1.直接挖掘或劈砍
2.对著一个方块右键打开合成台
3.对着空气右键发射弹幕
4.使用时会消耗耐久，耐久空了会消耗红石自动充能

下载地址：
必要API：
http://115.com/folder/faui105r#
MOD：
http://115.com/folder/fc39f56h#
TouhouAliceExc一项

图片：

对着方块右键打开便携合成太




c.JPG (26.27 KB, 下载次数: 17)

下载附件

2012-5-31 22:06 上传





没有红石可是无法发挥强大力量的哦




d.JPG (28.1 KB, 下载次数: 17)

下载附件

2012-5-31 22:06 上传





对着空气右键可以发射出许多箭，蓄力越大弹幕越分散

replies.author: ykc200
replies.txt_content:
DollCore
r,_,b
r,d,b
_,r,_

r: Redstone powder, b: Lapis lazuli, d: Diamond

Intermediate items for making dolls. The blue and red heart-shaped.
When right-clicking the dolls with this item, you can be toggled on/off the dolls.
When right-click-hold as the bow, you can aggregate dolls which are following or patrolling.
DollShanghai
s,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

s: Gold Sword, w: Wool, c: DollCore

Shanghai doll. Blue dress.
This have mob detection capabilities. When the patrol mode keeps track of the neutral mob or attack the enemy mob.
In rare cases, pluck feathers from chickens, wools from sheep, red mushroom from mooshroom.
DollHorai
p,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

p: Gold pickaxe, w: Wool, c: DollCore

Horai doll. Red dress.
This has ore detection and mining capabilities. Because leaving the mined items ,recommend Russian dolls as support.
Melons and pumpkins are destroyed also.Take care!
DollOoedo
t,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

t: TNT, w: Wool, c: DollCore

Oedo doll. Green dress.
Includes features that track the enemy and explode. Creeper compatible.
This feature is enabled only when the patrol mode.
DollRussia

e,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

e: Chest, w: Wool, c: DollCore

Russian dolls. Purple dress.
This doll have a chest feature. Also, collect the items in the vicinity.
Right-clicking while holding your chest, you can open doll's chest.
If the torch is in the slot of the top left, put the torch to that dark place.
DollGermany
a,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

a: Gold axe, w: Wool, c: DollCore

Germany doll. Orange clothing.
When doll is patrol mode, find a tree and fell it.
This doll considers a tree as the wood blocks stacked on dirt or grass block
and which have contact with four or more leaves.
DollLondon
e,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

e: Eye of Ender, w: Wool, c: DollCore

London doll. Light aqua dress.
Search if there is spawner in doll existing chunk and neighbor 8 chunks.
Shows the direction of the nearest Stronghold.
DollBare
_,w,_
w,c,w
_,w,_

w: Wool, c: DollCore

Test doll. underwear.
For debugging.
